dataset.title: Macrophytes (relative abundance) at Doñana LTSER Platform (2012)

section.para: Seasonal time-constrained sampling from shore to deepest point of relative abundance (derived from percent cover, see the following table ) of macrophytes at 4 sites representing the Doñana wetlands diversity (IDL1: Permanent phreatic lagoon, IDL12: Temporary phreatic lagoon, IDL54: Tributary river to the marshland and IDL46: Sesonally flooded marshland.1 Species present in the sample by just one individual2 Percent cover less than 5%3 Percent cover more than5% and 25% and 50%

section.title: Dataset access and use constraints
section.para: Principal:Public has granted a permission of type:Free for access and use upon request
Formal acknowledgement of the dataset providers

para.ulink: Time-constrained de visu sampling of macrophytes percent cover per species

para.literalLayout: Every water body is sampled during 15' starting from the shore to the deepest point. Macrophyte species are recorded and relative abundance is de visu assigned according to the following criteria:1 Species present in the sample by just one individual2 Percent cover less than 5%3 Percent cover more than5% and 25% and 50%Sampling period strictly depends on presence of water in the water bodies and is selected according to vegetative activity. Usually this corresponds to 2 seasonal samplings.
